replies.body: Yes two nights in a row. It's getting really old.
Two ranked games in a row someone on my team has kept lagging out, mostly cost us both those games...
After game finished keep showing game crashed， wont come out result and ask me to reconnect???   this is real life =.=
The biggest troll is that the nexus was actually 3 hits away from destruction...
ive been dc'd im watching a stream and it logs in so it cant be my net, will we get some kind of recognition that the server was the issue and not get a loss and lose out promo's n stuff ?
